attributes.action: ENFORCE PART P AND PROSECUTE OFFENDERS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Part P IS working
It’s only the weekend electricians and cowboys who are against part P
It’s about time all the cash in hand weekend electricians and rogue traders were made to stop

Every decent repeatable electrician has nothing to fear or hide. It’s the ones who can’t get registered who are up in arms about part P


The government must act now to preserve the genuine electrical contractor and give them a fare competition.
